# [Interview #167: COT Signing Report - Tallis, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=167#5)

#### Robert Jordan

There are many clues as to Mesaana's identity, enough that we should figure it out before
*Crossroads of Twilight*
. He basically said that he'd full-out reveal her in upcoming books, though, "...and if you still don't know, well, you'll find out later."
